about_the_game:
Blankspace's Digital Artbook has 70 pages packed with everything from the earliest prototype sketches through to all the final, completed artwork used in the game.

These are combined with extensive developer's notes, background, and never-before-disclosed trivia from Nayru to showcase the full year's worth of work that went into its creation.

Being a one-woman team certainly made working on Blankspace a challenge, although Xolf - initially the proofreader - ended up joining the project as a co-writer mid-development. That means you'll find some notes from him, too, as well as from awnalia, the creator of the 'Spot the differences' puzzles.

"I'm always eager to see 'behind the scenes' content from games I enjoy, so I hope you'll have a great time going through this artbook yourself." - Nayru

"Good news: absolutely *nothing* drawn by me in here. Your eyes are safe!" - Xolf

Please note: The content inside contains major spoilers. It is advised to view the artbook after finishing the game.

A wallpaper pack (provided in both 2560x1440 and 1920x1080 resolutions) is included with the artbook as a bonus.

Once installed, you'll find the artbook and wallpapers inside your Steam game folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the pages in the artbook depict blood, implied suicide, and panty-shots.

Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Wallpaper Resolution: 2560x1440, 1920x1080

short_description: A 70-page Digital Artbook for Blankspace, including finished game assets, prototype sketches, trivia, and developer's notes.
